Desc.entry: Adventure social group for people aged 18 years and over. Activities include abseiling, aromatherapy, hovercraft driving, horse riding, dining out, dry slope skiing, fire eating, Formula Ford driving and much more. Holds an event each day of the week, ceilidhs in Spring and Autumn and a Midsummer Ball each year.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Sat in the month at 8pm (introductory meeting), Mon-Fri evenings, Sat & Sun (activities and events)
